Hastily, I'm on the western ridge.

'I've come to acknowledge the object of my desire.'
Reading from a book
"What's the use of being an old man who reads?
He reads further, only to cover his eyes.
Although this idea is quite ordinary.
I've sent my lofty sentiments to infinity.
He mistakenly mills away a thousand ancient minds.
I've tossed and turned, and I've almost forgotten my meal.
I didn't know that the white clouds were gone.
It's late in the mountains during the spring retreat.
Sending Lu Yinshi back to Mount Lu
Worldly affairs are like cycles.
What's right and wrong are never exhausted.
I envy you for returning to the deep mountains.
I'll let others criticize the small and the hermit.
The yellow bird has risen high.
The white clouds aren't going anywhere near.
Heavenly music returns to loneliness.
Why did he peak and get a clear assent?
I was just returning to Mount Nanping.
It's cold in the stone room when I return late in the year.
The pines and roses are so quiet that they wander about by themselves.
He only knows that a year has passed beneath the forest.
He doesn't see the myriad difficulties of the human condition.
Zhaoyin has a poem written on the stone to mark his return.
"He reads it without explanation and looks at it at the time.
"This mind has been united with that of emptiness.
His body is like a floating cloud; there's no need to look at it.
Entering Shibi Shan
"My body is like a floating cloud, and my years seem to flow by.
It's better to stop the chaos of the world.
In old age, he's already grown accustomed to the son of Qingluo.
He should pursue the white path when he's hidden away.
He'd rather calculate the path directly into the troubled mountains.
He's sure to see the falling leaves before he knows it's autumn.
Some time later, people meet at the mouth of the valley.
Don't ask him to cut a poem to thank the five marquis.
They would acknowledge their own happiness in the mountains.
Don't be forced to climb into all things as is appropriate.
He'll return to the mountain after passing through the morning market for a while.
A life of toil isn't necessarily a life of fame.
To praise his nature, he should go somewhere quiet.
It's like stopping to ask about images in a dream.
He can only recite it and enjoy his face.
Would the Wayfarer in Xiangyang know this?
The monkeys and cranes are in the stone room in a desolate state.
A Message to Yuanlao Chengtian
Things get more leisurely in these clear, distant years.
It doesn't matter if it's beneath the forest or among people.
Attaining the ultimate understanding of Chan, it's not noisy and quiet.
Why would a silent guest go back and forth?
The rare stones and clear canopies add to his excellent interest.
The flowing springs and turquoise seats illuminate his declining countenance.
The time is opportune when he's free from form.
He should laugh when he returns and buys another mountain.
The Title of the Commandment (on account of circumstances)
"He chants aloud, gazing out from afar as he leans against the clouds and ladders.
The sutras on past events are entirely inscribable.
The two essays on the Way and the Virtue are only self-refuting.
How can right and wrong be matched on a single horse?
The true jade of Mt. Huei is wounded by the fire.
The spiritual snake that lost its water was afraid to get stuck in the mud.
He sends a message to the gods that he'll go up.
Don't even think about lowering your wings above the clouds.
New Year's Day
"In the dark, spring rushes the dawn to light.
The hundred fowls welcome the new sound of the dawn.
The cold of the past year is still stinging the dragons and snakes.
The Tibetan calendar is first transmitted, and the sun and moon welcome it.
The daylily leaves begin to appear at four times now.
Once the plum blossoms take precedence.
The mountain family also wishes Yao Tian long life.
We've been studying on Ox Mountain to attain peace.

source_sentence: 著書罷思南還復會客自番禺來因賦此詩平昔著書今粗畢。
translation: After writing my book, I thought about returning south and meeting a visitor from Panyu, so I composed this poem.

"But I'm sure the scenery and goods in Yangcheng are fine.

They resisted the traces of the mountains and forests and sent off their white heads.
A Solitary Admirer at Cold Spring, addressed to Shang Ren Chonghui
The south wind sweeps the waves and fills the streams with water.
A secluded man comes to wash his clothes in the mountains.
By the side of the independent stream, his interest is clear.
They even love the short flow of fragrant grass from the spring.
We all live in seclusion, and our discussions are valued in dissipation.
The world's ways are too diverse to count.
In the fifth month of summer, the clouds among men are troubled.

Three Excerpts from the Pastimes
"His leisurely aspiration should be followed by Kyaukyo's example.

During the rain on the day of the winter solstice

Rising early...
"The moon in the sky is past, and the stars are remote.

To a magpie
"When I'm lying quietly, I'm surprised by the number of magpies and joy.
"In a moment, an old friend will surely pass by.

Washing the brush

Each word comes from here.
"The minds of the world are not deceived.
